welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spokane, a charming city known for its beautiful riverfront, vibrant arts scene, and outdoor recreation opportunities. We hope you enjoy your time here and take in all that this wonderful city has to offer!"

restaurants.name: Bruncheonette
restaurants.description: Bruncheonette is a breakfast spot located in Spokane.

restaurants.description: Versalia Pizza Kendall Yards is a pizzeria located in Spokane.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Felts Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and chartered flights at Felts Field Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spokane International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves Alaska Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves United Airlines and its regional partners.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coeur D'Alene Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Coeur D'Alene Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
